title: Cut Me Down
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Don't you let me down
You want it no it shouldn't
You're not using all my trouble
You're hiding to find it couldn't
[Chorus]
You
Don't make me wanna see
Don't make me wanna turn
[Verse 2]
Take this life behind
We can't wait no we shouldn't
Get out of here I am falling
It's hiding behind it's shutters
[Chorus]
You
Don't make me wanna see
Don't make me wanna turn
You
Don't make me wanna see
Don't make me wanna see
Don't make me wanna turn
